text: was looking for a quick advancement that i could pay back in a few days, but i hate asking for help. this was awesome. even though they said initially i could get $250, i was only allowed $50. so be prepared for that. also... it’s not a scam!! i totally thought it was.

reply.message: Hi there, Cass. Thank you so much for this awesome 5-star review! We're happy to know that our 0% APR InstaCash is to provide assistance and help you with securing that financial stability! It’s members like you that help makes MoneyLion ROAR! Additionally, the amount of Instacash you are eligible to receive is based on a variety of factors, including your MoneyLion account history, deposit and spending activity, repayment history, and other risk-based factors, as determined by MoneyLion in its sole discretion, and may change from time to time. Therefore, demonstrating consistent direct deposits and on-time payments can increase your Instacash eligibility, while a negative change in these factors could lower your Instacash eligibility. One of the best ways to ensure higher amounts of Instacash is connecting your direct deposits to a RoarMoney account. The same direct deposit when detected in RoarMoney (vs. an external bank account) will unlock TWICE the Instacash Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub? text: Whenever I contact MoneyLion, my issue is never resolved, I called MoneyLion multiple times about why my instacash was blocked and then reduced, they put multiple tickets in and yet no one contacted me about it or fixed it. I filed a dispute and the dispute team basically said that because the dispute wasn’t filed sooner for fraudulent charges I didn’t make I couldn’t get my money back or a credit for those charges, even when I filed the dispute the same day I noticed those charges. On top of all that every time I pay off my loan MoneyLion negatively reports that to my credit, so it hurts my credit every time. I used to recommend MoneyLion to people but after all the s-hit I’ve been through dealing with MoneyLion the past 2 years on top of being the only bank I keep my money, I’m about done and wouldn’t recommend MoneyLion to anyone. I needed my funds from my dispute and my instacash the most while I was in Ny with my family for my daughters birthday and I thought moneylion would’ve resolved my issue before her birthday, I was calling literally everyday and no one helped at all. At this point as soon as I get some extra money I’m just gonna go to a different bank. At first I thought MoneyLion was better than most banks but as time went on I realized that I was wrong. I’ve been through way too much stress dealing with MoneyLion than I ever had with any other bank and you guys are about to lose the most loyal customer because of all that you put me through.
title: Whenever I contact MoneyLion

text: The worst customer service experience ever. Signed up for small loan (July 2019), term was for 1 year. Provided all the necessary information for them to start my repayment process. Then NOTHING, the representative in charge of entering my information into their system, did so incorrectly, and now my credit has paid the price. I have tried now for 15 months to get MoneyLion to correct THEIR error and start the repayment process, and fix my credit report. See when they messed up the information my credit went from 640 to below 460. All because THEY made a mistake. One that they still haven't fixed. I have spoken with then several times, had two repayment arrangements, and nothing. It is all on them. I have provided the information and THEY can not follow through. DO NOT USE
title: The worst customer service experience…DONT DO IT
